Examples¶

General Examples¶

General purpose and introductory examples for mcmodels.

Modified Scikit-Learn Examples¶

The following examples are modified examples from the package Scikit-Learn licensed under the New BSD (3-clause) License reproduced in the each of the following scripts:

  • Nadaraya-Watson Regression
  • Plot NonnegativeRidge coefficients as a function of regularization
  • NonnegativeLinear Least Squares and NonnegativeRidge Regression Variance

Plot NonnegativeRidge coefficients as a function of regularization

NonnegativeLinear Least Squares and NonnegativeRidge Regression Variance

Nadaraya-Watson Regression

Download all examples in Python source code: auto_examples_python.zip
Download all examples in Jupyter notebooks: auto_examples_jupyter.zip

If you encounter any problems using the AllenSDK, please create an issue on Github's issue tracker.
